text: The MSI GE Series GE75 Raider-286 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the MSI GE Series GE75 Raider-286 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the MSI GE Series GE75 Raider-286 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Elden Ring. The build quality of the MSI GE Series GE75 Raider-286 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the MSI GE Series GE75 Raider-286 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
